body: You have been blessed by Gozreh to be as comfortable in the wilderness as you are at home. You gain a +2 trait bonus on Survival checks to find food and water, and a +1 trait bonus on Knowledge (nature) checks. One of these skills (your choice) is always a class skill for you.
name: Child of Nature
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Character Background/Traits/Religion Traits/Child of Nature
